name: PriceSmart, Inc.
description: PriceSmart, Inc. is a leading operator of membership shopping warehouse clubs in Central America and the Caribbean. Founded in 1996 and based in San Diego, California, PriceSmart has established a unique business model that combines the best elements of warehouse club retailing with a strong emphasis on providing high-quality products at competitive prices. The company operates 47 warehouse clubs under the PriceSmart brand, serving a diverse customer base across several countries, including Costa Rica, Panama, and Jamaica. PriceSmart offers a wide range of products, including groceries, electronics, home goods, and apparel, all sourced from reputable suppliers to ensure quality. The company is committed to delivering exceptional value and a superior shopping experience, which is reflected in its membership-based model that encourages customer loyalty. PriceSmart also emphasizes sustainability and community engagement, participating in various initiatives to support local economies and reduce its environmental impact. With a strategic focus on expansion and innovation, PriceSmart aims to enhance its market presence and deliver even greater value to its members.

seo.meta_title: PriceSmart, Inc. | Membership Shopping Warehouse Clubs
seo.meta_description: Explore PriceSmart, Inc., a leading operator of membership warehouse clubs in Central America and the Caribbean, offering quality products at competitive prices.

faq.question: What is PriceSmart known for?
faq.answer: PriceSmart is known for its membership-based warehouse clubs that offer a wide range of quality products at competitive prices.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of PriceSmart?
faq.answer: John L. W. W. Price is the CEO of PriceSmart, Inc.

faq.question: Where is PriceSmart headquartered?
faq.answer: PriceSmart is headquartered in San Diego, California, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does PriceSmart offer?
faq.answer: PriceSmart offers groceries, electronics, home goods, and apparel among other products.
